channel.title: Convert To PI

item.title: Convert To PI
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

If anyone can convert this to PI i love yu long time ++

[code]int amt = 0;
if (c.IsDead)
return;
for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++) {
c.sendFrame34(6822, -1, k, 1);
}
if (c.Skulled) {
if (c.protItem) {
c.keepItem1();
if (c.itemKept1 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(6822, c.itemKept1, 0, 1);
}
c.sendString("@or1@Max items kept on death: ~ 1 ~", 18104);
} else {
c.sendString("@or1@Max items kept on death: ~ 0 ~", 18105);
}
} else {
c.keepItem1();
if (c.itemKept1 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(6963, c.itemKept1, 0, 1);
amt++;
}
c.keepItem2();
if (c.itemKept2 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(6963, c.itemKept2, 1, 1);
amt++;
}
c.keepItem3();
if (c.itemKept3 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(6963, c.itemKept3, 2, 1);
amt++;
}
if (c.protItem) {
c.keepItem4();
if (c.itemKept4 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(6963, c.itemKept4, 3, 1);
amt++;
}
}
c.sendString(“Items Kept on Death”, 18103);
c.sendString(“Items you will keep on death (if not skulled):”, 18104);
c.sendString(“Items you will lose on death(if not skulled):”, 18105);
c.sendString(“Information:”, 18106);
c.sendString(“Max Items Kept on death:”, 18107);
c.sendString("~ 3 ~", 18108);
c.sendString(“The normal amount of”, 18109);
c.sendString(“items kept is three.”, 18110);
c.sendString("", 18111);

			}
			if (c.isInFightPits() || c.isInFightCaves()) {
				c.sendString("@or1@You are in a @gre@Safe@or1@ area", 18112);
			} else {
				c.sendString("@or1@You are in a @red@Dangerous@or1@", 18112);
				c.sendString("area. You can lose items.", 18113);
			}
			c.resetKeepItem();
			c.showInterface(18100);
			break;[/code]
